product_name: CamelBak Classic Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Hate messing with tons of extra straps and snaps? The CamelBak Classic(TM) Hydration Pack is a no-frills solution if you're looking for a comfortable, fuss-free way to stay hydrated on your ride. Lightweight design holds the 70 fl. oz. (2 liter) Antidote(TM) reservoir with a wide mouth cap for easy filling; quick-snap reservoir cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Mesh shoulder straps offer a comfortable fit and cooling airflow; sternum strap adds stability. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Flip-up back panel combined with a rip-and-stick closure at the top of the pack provides easy access to the reservoir. Single zip pocket offers a secure place for keys or a multitool; elastic lacing on the outside holds rolled-up extra layers or gloves. The CamelBak Classic Hydration Pack features reflective detailing on front and back, increasing your visibility in low light.
short_description: Hate messing with tons of extra straps and snaps? The CamelBak Classic(TM) Hydration Pack is a no-frills solution if you're looking for a comfortable, fuss-free way to stay hydrated on your ride.
